children.text: Stanley Kubrick: A Life in Pictures

is a documentary that offers an in-depth look at the life and career of the legendary filmmaker. Narrated by Tom Cruise, the film traces Kubrick’s evolution from a young photographer in New York to one of cinema’s most influential auteurs. Featuring rare behind-the-scenes footage, personal photographs, and interviews with family members, collaborators, and admirers—including Steven Spielberg, Martin Scorsese, and Arthur C. Clarke—the documentary provides a comprehensive and intimate portrait of Kubrick’s artistic legacy.

title: Stanley Kubrick A Life in Pictures (2001)
